column1: | for larry cook larry newton cook
column7: he was the son of the late everette lee cook and ruby guynell white cook. he was a retired rn and served in the us army. survivors include his wife of twenty five years
column12: tammy cook franklin & todd of drexel
column17: dwayne & bradley deaton both of newland
column21: curly & tater. visitation: 10:00am until 11:00am tuesday at stamey tysinger funeral home & cremation center. the funeral service will be 11:00am tuesday at stamey tysinger funeral home & cremation center chapel with rev. terrill crump officiating. burial will follow in olive grove baptist church cemetery. memorials may be made to burke hospice & palliative care 1715 enon road valdese
